titleStmt.title: The message from the Hovse of Commons to the Lords by Bulstrode Whitlocke and presented to Their Lordships by him. Whereunto is added His Maiesties most gracious answer to their message, February 22, 1642.
titleStmt.author: Whitlocke, Bulstrode, 1605-1675 or 6.
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

notesStmt.note: A discussion of measures to be taken against the Irish Rebellion. The Kings answer appears in paraphrase only.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
